title: Introduction
body: With 2+ years of experience in data-related works and projects, I enjoy turning raw data into meaningful insights.

title: Education
body: Bachelor of Engineering Technology in Computer Engineering Technology at TUP.

title: Interesting Fact About Me
body: Just someone who enjoys coding, working with data and learning new things.

title: Personal Philosophy
body: I believe in continous learning but also in taking breaks -- spending time with my cats, playing games, or exploring new things.
